title: SimpleChange
contents:
API > @angular/core
mode_edit code

SimpleChangelink

Represents a basic change from a previous to a new value for a single property on a directive instance. Passed as a value in a SimpleChanges object to the ngOnChanges hook.

class SimpleChange { constructor(previousValue: any, currentValue: any, firstChange: boolean) previousValue: any currentValue: any firstChange: boolean isFirstChange(): boolean }
